description: Rejects an invitation to a resource share from another Amazon Web Services account.

parameters.name: resourceShareInvitationArn
parameters.description: Specifies the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the invitation that you want to reject.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: Specifies a unique, case-sensitive identifier that you provide to ensure the idempotency of the request. This lets you safely retry the request without accidentally performing the same operation a second time. Passing the same value to a later call to an operation requires that you also pass the same value for all other parameters. We recommend that you use a UUID type of value.. If you don't provide this value, then Amazon Web Services generates a random one for you. If you retry the operation with the same ClientToken, but with different parameters, the retry fails with an IdempotentParameterMismatch error.

nested_items.name: resourceShareInvitation
nested_items.description: An object that contains the details about the rejected invitation.

nested_items.name: resourceShareInvitationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the invitation.

nested_items.name: resourceShareName
nested_items.description: The name of the resource share.

nested_items.name: resourceShareArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource share.

nested_items.name: senderAccountId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account that sent the invitation.

nested_items.name: receiverAccountId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account that received the invitation.

nested_items.name: invitationTimestamp
nested_items.description: The date and time when the invitation was sent.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of the invitation.

nested_items.name: resourceShareAssociations
nested_items.description: To view the resources associated with a pending resource share invitation, use  ListPendingInvitationResources.

nested_items.name: resourceShareArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource share.

nested_items.name: resourceShareName
nested_items.description: The name of the resource share.

nested_items.name: associatedEntity
nested_items.description: The associated entity. This can be either of the following:
For a resource association, this is the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource.
For principal associations, this is one of the following:
The ID of an Amazon Web Services account.
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an organization in Organizations.
The ARN of an organizational unit (OU) in Organizations.
The ARN of an IAM role.
The ARN of an IAM user.

nested_items.name: associationType
nested_items.description: The type of entity included in this association.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of the association.

nested_items.name: statusMessage
nested_items.description: A message about the status of the association.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: The date and time when the association was created.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedTime
nested_items.description: The date and time when the association was last updated.

nested_items.name: external
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the principal belongs to the same organization in Organizations as the Amazon Web Services account that owns the resource share.

nested_items.name: receiverArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM user or role that received the invitation.

nested_items.name: clientToken
nested_items.description: The idempotency identifier associated with this request. If you want to repeat the same operation in an idempotent manner then you must include this value in the clientToken request parameter of that later call. All other parameters must also have the same values that you used in the first call.
